title.rendered: Board of Education Meeting on March 27

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a regular meeting on March 27 at 7 p.m.  The meeting will be held at Saratoga Springs High School.  Watch the meeting through youtube.

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
